items.title: GameStop drops 9% despite initiating bitcoin buying plan with $500 million purchase
items.description: The purchase, GameStop's first investment in bitcoin, was worth $512.6 million with bitcoin's price of $108,837 Wednesday.

items.title: These biotech stocks will benefit as generative AI speeds up drug discovery, Jefferies says
items.description: The adoption of generative AI in drug discovery will save companies years and billions of dollars in getting new drugs to market, the firm said.

items.title: These stocks will move the most from Nvidia’s AI earnings report
items.description: Nvidia isn’t the only stock that will move following the chipmaker’s earnings reports, UBS's trading desk found.

items.title: These stocks could be winners if Trump devalues the U.S. dollar, according to Jefferies
items.description: Companies with large overseas sales, particularly China, could benefit if the White House engineers a deliberate dollar devaluation, according to Jeff...

items.title: Baird upgrades credit scoring stock after plunging on regulatory concern
items.description: The investment firm upgraded the credit scoring firm to outperform from neutral.
